about_the_game:
A surreal/psychological action platformer that focuses on the concept of balance. Switch between 2 playable lizards and harmonize their strenghts and weaknesses against villains with nonsensical motives.

In a world gone insane awaken as 2 lizardmen bound together by the dimensional power of a crystal.
Forced to come to terms with each others differences you must journey to gain knowledge and conquer the dangers that await.

Key features
  • Fast paced action combat: Switch characters to go ranged or mele, extract love from your defeated enemies and your surroundings to gain temporary damage boosts. Unleash your ultimate moves by charging chaos energy or building rage.
  • Hubworld based level selection each with their own theme and story arcs.
  • Collect eyes of gore and Hearts of love and use them to boost your combat abilities between levels.
  • Original soundtrack focused on synths mixed with surreal weirdness.
  • Each world is focused on a specific Villain and their nonsensical ideologies and motives.

content_descriptors.notes: Dark themes and violence, references to drug use.
